attributes.bytes-consumed-rate: The average number of bytes consumed per second
attributes.bytes-consumed-total: The total number of bytes consumed
attributes.fetch-latency-avg: The average time taken for a fetch request.
attributes.fetch-latency-max: The max time taken for any fetch request.
attributes.fetch-rate: The number of fetch requests per second.
attributes.fetch-size-avg: The average number of bytes fetched per request
attributes.fetch-size-max: The maximum number of bytes fetched per request
attributes.fetch-throttle-time-avg: The average throttle time in ms
attributes.fetch-throttle-time-max: The maximum throttle time in ms
attributes.fetch-total: The total number of fetch requests.
attributes.records-consumed-rate: The average number of records consumed per second
attributes.records-consumed-total: The total number of records consumed
attributes.records-lag-max: The maximum lag in terms of number of records for any partition in this window. NOTE: This is based on current offset and not committed offset
attributes.records-lead-min: The minimum lead in terms of number of records for any partition in this window
attributes.records-per-request-avg: The average number of records in each request

attributes.bytes-consumed-rate: The average number of bytes consumed per second for a topic
attributes.bytes-consumed-total: The total number of bytes consumed for a topic
attributes.fetch-size-avg: The average number of bytes fetched per request for a topic
attributes.fetch-size-max: The maximum number of bytes fetched per request for a topic
attributes.records-consumed-rate: The average number of records consumed per second for a topic
attributes.records-consumed-total: The total number of records consumed for a topic
attributes.records-per-request-avg: The average number of records in each request for a topic

attributes.preferred-read-replica: The current read replica for the partition, or -1 if reading from leader
attributes.records-lag: The latest lag of the partition
attributes.records-lag-avg: The average lag of the partition
attributes.records-lag-max: The max lag of the partition
attributes.records-lead: The latest lead of the partition
attributes.records-lead-avg: The average lead of the partition
attributes.records-lead-min: The min lead of the partition
